### Figure with includegraphics and options

\begin{figure}%[H]
\centering
 \includegraphics[width=0.45\textwidth]{fig1.png}
 \caption{This is a caption.}
\end{figure}

---

\begin{figure}%[H]
\centering
 \includegraphics[width=0.45\textwidth]{fig1.png}
 \caption{<s>Guvf vf n pncgvba.</s>}
\end{figure}

### Subfigures

\begin{figure*}[ht]
    
    \centering
    \begin{subfigure}{0.55\columnwidth}
        \centering
        \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{foo1.png} % asdf
        \caption{}
        \label{fig:subfig_a}
    \end{subfigure}
    \hfill
    \begin{subfigure}{0.55\columnwidth}
        \centering
        \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{foo2.png} % aaa
        \caption{}
        \label{fig:subfig_b}
    \end{subfigure}
    \caption{this is a great figure.}
    \label{fig:xyz}
\end{figure*}

---

\begin{figure*}[ht]
    
    \centering
    \begin{subfigure}{0.55\columnwidth}
        \centering
        \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{foo1.png} % asdf
        \caption{}
        \label{fig:subfig_a}
    \end{subfigure}
    \hfill
    \begin{subfigure}{0.55\columnwidth}
        \centering
        \includegraphics[width=\linewidth]{foo2.png} % aaa
        \caption{}
        \label{fig:subfig_b}
    \end{subfigure}
    \caption{<s>guvf vf n terng svther.</s>}
    \label{fig:xyz}
\end{figure*}
